text.tspan: Two measures of government expenditure as a share of GDP, 2010
This chart shows the relationship between central government expenditure as a share of GDP (WDI data using IMF
estimates) and total government expenditure, also as share of GDP (Mauro et al 2015 using IMF estimates).
Source: World Bank – WDI, IMF Fiscal Affairs Departmental Data, based on Mauro et al. (2015)
